thread.title: richard wolfe
thread.title_full: Save On Energy reviewed by richard wolfe

author: richard wolfe
title: richard wolfe
text: Fast, easy, and semi-comprehensive. The young lady knew her business and explained it rapidly. Being a senior citizen, I am slow at understanding all she said so just agreed where asked. Having had TXU for over thirty years in the past, I trust your service....hopefully this will continue.
